Container.Name: wh-npmplus
Container.Overview: Docker container for managing Nginx proxy hosts with a simple, powerful interface.

Config.Name: NPMplus web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port NPMplus listens on.

Config.Name: GoAccess web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port GoAccess listens on.

Config.Name: HTTP port
Config.Description: The TCP port HTTP listens on.

Config.Name: HTTPS port
Config.Description: The TCP port HTTPS listens on.

Config.Name: HTTP/3 port
Config.Description: The UDP port HTTP/3 listens on.

Config.Name: NPMplus storage
Config.Description: The location where NPMplus stores its data.

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Specify a timezone: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List

Config.Name: NGINX_LOG_NOT_FOUND
Config.Description: Allow logging of 404 errors.

Config.Name: NGINX_404_REDIRECT
Config.Description: Redirect to '/' instead of showing a 404 error page

Config.Name: NGINX_DISABLE_PROXY_BUFFERING
Config.Description: Disables the proxy-buffering option of nginx

Config.Name: SKIP_IP_RANGES
Config.Description: Skip feteching/whitelisting IP ranges from AWS and Cloudflare.

Config.Name: LOGROTATE
Config.Description: Enables writing HTTP access logs, stream access logs, and enables daily log rotation.

Config.Name: LOGROTATIONS
Config.Description: Set how often the access.log should be rotated until it is deleted.

Config.Name: GOA
Config.Description: Enables GoAccess, requires LOGROTATE set to 'true'.

Config.Name: CLEAN
Config.Description: Clean folders

Config.Name: CRT
Config.Description: The amount of hours between Certbot trying to renew your certificates.

Config.Name: IPRT
Config.Description: The amount of hours between updating the IP ranges from AWS and Cloudflare.

Config.Name: GOACLA
Config.Description: Arguments that should be passed to GoAccess.

Config.Name: PHP82
Config.Description: Activates PHP 8.2

Config.Name: PHP82_APKS
Config.Description: Add PHP 8.2 extensions.

Config.Name: PHP83
Config.Description: Activates PHP 8.3

Config.Name: PHP83_APKS
Config.Description: Add PHP 8.3 extensions.
